dmca.title: Request to Google to Remove Links to Poems
dmca.body:
9/28/2004

Google, Inc.
Attn: Customer Support, DMCA Complaints 
[private]
Mountain View, CA 94043

Infringement Notification

1. The copyrighted work at issue is the two poems, "Red Berries" and "House Painting". "House Painting" was published by [private] (Shades Beyond Gray) under a pseudonym. "Red Berries" was initially published by [private] (Madpoetry.org), and later reproduced on my earlier website (Radiant Voice). Because of the copyright violation, both poems have been removed from the Internet at my request. To verify their initial publication, you may contact [private] ([private]@motherwit.com) and [private] ([private]@fibitz.com). I have already corresponded with both [private] and [private] about the issue and have files of my correspondence to that effect.

2. The material that is infringing the copyright is the text on the following two pages:
www.girlphoria.com/2004-april/redberries.htm and 
www.girlphoria.com/2004-april/housepainting.htm. 
The search query that I used was "[private]".

3. You may contact me at [private]@hotmail.com.

4. The contact information of the web site owner is [private]@girlphoria.com.

5. I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, my agent, or the law.

6. I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

Thank you for your time. 

Sincerely,

[private]
[private]@hotmail.com
